pkgmetadata.longdescription: Lazy Search in R Packages, Task Views, CRAN, the Web. All-in-One Download // Search by keywords in R packages, task views, CRAN, the web and display the results in console, txt, html or pdf pages. Within a single instruction, download the whole documentation (html index, pdf manual, vignettes, source code, etc), either in a flat format or in subdirectories defined by the keywords. Several functions for task view maintenance. Quick links to more than 60 web search engines. Lazy evaluation of non-standard content is available throughout the package and eases the use of many functions.
